h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location
content: Upon finding the Horse Guai for this final time, you can pull the chain in the mouth of the elemental cart next to them to obtain the Spell.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Dark_Thunder.md', within the main section titled 'Dark Thunder', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location'.
The content is as follows:
Upon finding the Horse Guai for this final time, you can pull the chain in the mouth of the elemental cart next to them to obtain the Spell.
